word:
I must say a few words more. Please tell those who recently went to Australia from America that they must be very careful how they speak in 


                                    -256- 

regard to the work that has been done in that field. God will not be pleased if they send back to America words of gloomy unbelief. Please tell them not to open their lips in complaint, but to say, "What hath God wrought!" He hath fulfilled His Word, and set a table in the wilderness. . . .
